newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Banco do Brasil has 29.8 mln real July gain.
newsitem.headline: Banco do Brasil has 29.8 mln real July gain.

text.p: Brazilian federal bank Banco do Brasil's monthly results came out of the red in July for the first time since last year, posting a $29.778 million real profit, the bank said in a statement.
The statement said the profit was equivalent to 0.04 reais per 1000-share lot.
A spokesman said the July result was the first positive monthly figure since December 1995, when Banco do Brasil made a 52-million-real net gain.
Banco do Brasil posted the country's largest ever commercial loss in the first-half 1996, plunging 7.8 billion reais into the red after posting a 4.2 billion real loss in 1995.
